node.text: HELLO. WELCOME TO THE THORNHILL PRESERVATION SOCIETY, WHERE WE CATEGORIZE, RESEARCH, AND SELL ARTIFACTS TO TRADERS. WE CURRENTLY ARE NOT ACCEPTNING NEW CLIENTELE, BUT WE DO HAVE

option.optiontext: I AM INTERESTED IN THE WORK.

node.text: YES, THE ACQUISITION OF ARTIFACTS CAN BE CONSIDERED A LEGAL GRAY AREA THAT NOT EVERYONE AGREES WITH. GENERALLY SUPERSTITIOUS LOCALS OPPOSE THE REMOVAL OF ARTIFACTS THEY DEEM AS CURSED.
